name: Torques Must Die!
description:
A Spinner-based rogue-lite adventure by Matt Woelk!

Unlock new abilities, and an increasingly long chain of enemies! Can you beat them all?

Tips:

  • Each time you die, you unlock a powerful new weapon!
  • Each time you win, you unlock another foe, at the end of the chain.
  • Defeat the Lich, and you win the whole game!

Controls:

  • Mouse clicks for all interactions
  • F to toggle fullscreen
  • If the game is running slowly for you, press zero (0) and wait a couple of seconds. This will automatically set graphics settings for you.

Special Thanks:

  • Chris Love, for playtesting.
  • Dustin Bogers, for the game name.
  • skrjablin, for the CC0 music.
  • Morganne, for the colour palette.
  • Google, for the font.
  • DrPetter for the sound generation tool.

Made in 49 hours for GMTK Jam 2022.
